import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Participation} from "../../../Models/Entitys/Participation"; @Component({ selector: 'app-buy-pret', templateUrl: './buy-pret.component.html', styleUrls: ['./buy-pret.component.scss'] }) export class BuyPretComponent { displayedColumns: string[] = ['position', 'name', 'pret','datePret','rembourse', 'verser', 'action']; dataSource:Participation[]=[]; }
